description: This Rebol version is based of now supposed to be dead [RebolSource community](https://github.com/rebolsource/r3) version, which was based on even older Carl Sassenrath's original [Rebol3-alpha](https://github.com/rebol/rebol) version.
summary: Rebol3 version from Oldes as the last maintainer (probably)
author: Carl Sassenrath and Rebol Open Source Contributors
